briefTitle: Evolution Of Growth Rate In Children With Growth Retardation Due to Glucocorticosteroid Therapy And Treated By Genotonorm
officialTitle: Evolution Of Growth Rate In Children With Growth Retardation Related To Long-term Corticotherapy And Treated By Genotonorm
summary: To estimate the evolution of height and growth rate over 5 years of growth hormone (GH) treatment To estimate the prognostic factors of growth rate with GH treatment To confirm the good clinical and biological safety of GH treatment in such children

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Height Standard Deviation Score (SDS) for Chronological Age (CA) at Month 36: Full Analysis Population
